Address.value: 234 CHURCH STREET,SUITE 1020, NEW HAVEN, Connecticut, 06510, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Rallybio Corp is a biopharmaceutical company committed to identifying and accelerating the development of life-transforming therapies for patients with severe and rare disorders. Its lead program is for the prevention of fetal and neonatal alloimmune thrombocytopenia, a potentially life-threatening rare disease that can cause uncontrolled bleeding in fetuses and newborns.
